skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: With a strong command of HTML, CSS, responsive design, React, and proficiency in leveraging CSS libraries effectively, I specialize in crafting immersive and polished front-end experiences.

skills.title: Graphic design
skills.description: With a decade of graphic design experience, I've completed 150+ projects for clients worldwide. I specialize in using Illustrator and Photoshop to create captivating visual stories that bring ideas to life

skills.title: Web-design
skills.description: Specializing in web design, I excel in using Figma and WordPress to create visually appealing and functional websites

portfolio.title: Easy Cabin
portfolio.description: Cabins-for-rent simplifies cabin bookings with React Query and Supabase, offering seamless reservations and an enhanced user experience.

portfolio.title: Furni-Heaven
portfolio.description: E-commerce app integrating Auth0 login and Stripe payments. Filters enable easy product search by manufacturer, color, price, category. Cart for simple checkout.

portfolio.title: F1-Stat-Track
portfolio.description: React-based Formula 1 app: Explore the history of races, drivers, and teams since 1950. Browse, search, and discover insights. MIT License.

portfolio.title: Dedin Salas
portfolio.description: Working on exciting frontend design and responsiveness for a restaurant website in collaboration with www.petarplackov.com,  creating an  user-friendly digital experience.

testimonial.description: Very professional and a pleasure to work with such talent. Will definitely work with LEDU again shortly
